newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Ten die in Karachi fire after plane drops fuel tank.
newsitem.headline: Ten die in Karachi fire after plane drops fuel tank.

text.p: At least 10 people were killed on Thursday in a fire started after a fuel tank from a Pakistan Air Force plane broke off and fell into a residential area in Karachi, ambulance workers said quoting eyewitnesses.
Police said at least four charred bodies had been retrieved from the fire in the Gharibabad area of Karachi.
One police official said the plane was on a training flight but he could not identify the type of aircraft.
One volunteer of the Sattar Edhi Ambulance Services said at least 10 people had been killed in the fire.
"We have taken out four bodies and shifted them to a government hospital," the volunteer said. Witnesses said fire fighters managed to stop the fire from spreading to nearby residential areas.
